ValidationRule.description: SKU field is mandatory in order to save the Log a Call activity
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (ISBLANK( Product_SKU_Unknown__c )), (ISBLANK ( Product_Sku__c )), NOT($User.BypassVR__c), OR( ISPICKVAL ( Category__c , "Availability"), ISPICKVAL( Category__c , "Price"), ISPICKVAL ( Category__c , "Characteristics"), ISPICKVAL ( Category__c , "Reservation")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Resolution__c , "")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Note: Please complete mandatory fields: Product sku or Unknown product designation
